timeline.bodyText:
not 100% sure, but i think this won't work if you reactivate a pay selection. because then it is in "in progress".

so, use DocStatus.isDraftedOrInProgress()
also make sure to avoid NPEs. I.e. use ofNullableCode
note: i guess that assuming the C_PaySelection record itself exists is OK
